name: Dodge (itch) (Cherlie)
description:
Made By Charlie Taylor
YT:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDV5KFGKpDyNAtDquXq3KPQ

You play as a car or truck and your planet is being attacked by an alien. Your goal is to stay alive for as long as possible. 
WASD/Arrow Keys to move around, easy and simple.

Easy - Planet doesn't shrink, Slow alien, Car (Small Hitbox)
Normal - Planet shrinks, Normal speed alien, Car (Small Hitbox)
Hard- Planet shrinks FAST, Fast alien, Car (Small Hitbox)
Very Hard- Planet shrinks VERY FAST, Super fast alien, Truck (Large Hitbox)
